version_description: - bug fixes

- Draw your own tours and waypoints directly on the map
- Touch-up existing tours and imported GPX tracks or automatically snap them to the road network
- Selections now show distance markers
- Improved map layout

- Bug fixes

3.0:
- Draw your own tours and waypoints directly on the map
- Touch-up existing tours and imported GPX tracks or automatically snap them to the road network
- Selections now show distance markers
- Improved map layout

- More bug fixes

3.0:
- Draw your own tours and waypoints directly on the map
- Touch-up existing tours and imported GPX tracks or automatically snap them to the road network
- Selections now show distance markers
- Improved map layout

- fixed a number of bugs (some tours had display problems. After selecting a tour the app could repeatedly crash in certain circumstances)

3.0:
- Draw your own tours and waypoints directly on the map
- Touch-up existing tours and imported GPX tracks or automatically snap them to the road network
- Selections now show distance markers
- Improved map layout

We added many features you asked for:

- You can enter new waypoints directly in numeric latitude/longitude format
- We added different coordinate formats for displaying waypoints
- GPS indicator is modern-flat and adds a heading arrow
- Map rotation now also rotates labels
- Map display improvements (e.g. national parks, barriers on roads, bike and hiking routes, changed transparency for displayed routes)
- Ski-pistes overlay now becomes winter sport overlay with added nordic and sledge pistes
- Finally back: A long tap on the map zooms out - many of you wished this feature back
- You can sort the tour-list by creation date
- You can now open geo: links directly in MapOut
- Search is now faster and the user interface has been improved
- Improved ascent/descent calculation for flat areas
- Added "reverse tour" in tour drawing editor
- Swipe-to-delete a tour in the tour organizer will now always ask for confirmation
- Many bug fixes (e.g. negative altitude labels above 5460 m, nagging alerts in airplane mode, map update can fail because of falsely claimed low storage space)

- bug fixes

- Find all answers to your questions in our user manual: http://mapoutapp.com/manual

3.1:
We added many features you asked for:

- You can enter new waypoints directly in numeric latitude/longitude format
- We added different coordinate formats for displaying waypoints
- GPS indicator is modern-flat and adds a heading arrow
- Map rotation now also rotates labels
- Map display improvements (e.g. national parks, barriers on roads, bike and hiking routes, changed transparency for displayed routes)
- Ski-pistes overlay now becomes winter sport overlay with added nordic and sledge pistes
- Finally back: A long tap on the map zooms out - many of you wished this feature back
- You can sort the tour-list by creation date
- You can now open geo: links directly in MapOut
- Search is now faster and the user interface has been improved
- Improved ascent/descent calculation for flat areas
- Added "reverse tour" in tour drawing editor
- Swipe-to-delete a tour in the tour organizer will now always ask for confirmation
- Many bug fixes (e.g. negative altitude labels above 5460 m, nagging alerts in airplane mode, map update can fail because of falsely claimed low storage space)

- Support for iPhone X
- Choose between GPX or KML for exporting your tours
- Distance and altitude can now independently be set to metric/imperial units
- Adding waypoints now pre-fills title field with underlying map data
- Support for iPad Pro native screen size
- Many bug fixes
- Altitude profile bug fixes

- Colors! Select different colors for your waypoints and tours
- Choose unique icons for your waypoints
- Drawing/routing tours has been enhanced: You can now choose between different routing options (hiking, biking, shortest and freeform) and select the street width and elevation preference
- Many improvements to our map style: We now added much more icons for rural areas to find drinking water, picnic sites, shelters/huts, caves, etc.
- Overlays are now selectable directly on the main menu
- A lot of reported bugs have been fixed

- Many reported bugs have been fixed
- Added new setting to permanently display map scale

Version 3.2
- Colors! Select different colors for your waypoints and tours
- Choose unique icons for your waypoints
- Drawing/routing tours has been enhanced: You can now choose between different routing options (hiking, biking, shortest and freeform) and select the street width and elevation preference
- Many improvements to our map style: We now added much more icons for rural areas to find drinking water, picnic sites, shelters/huts, caves, etc.
- Overlays are now selectable directly on the main menu

- Improvements for Dutch cyclists
- Workaround for Garmin Connect interoperability
- New round of bug fixes

- Bulk export / backup of all tours (Settings – Tour Organizer – Backup Tours)
- Minor bug fixes

- Added icons for fireplaces and playgrounds
- Bug fixes (mostly in export / backup)

By popular request: In the tour organizer you can now make a multi-selection of tours and share, edit or move several elements in one go
- Added icons for mines, quarries and springs
- Improvements in the mountain bike overlay, supplemented by a dot pattern to indicate difficulty
- Enhancements to contour lines and text labels
- iOS 13 adjustments
- Various bug fixes
- Various bug fixes

- improved ascent/descent calculation
- improved recording of tours
- fixed some bugs
- fixed some altitude display related bugs
- minor bug fixes
- minor bug fixes

- Rotate the map freely in any direction you like
- Search has been completely revised: better, search-as-you-type results, distance display and the possibility to add waypoints from the search results
- Improved map style
- Many reported bugs fixed (e.g. export of ZIP files with special characters, dashboard problems and more)

- fixes some new bugs

3.4:
- Rotate the map freely in any direction you like
- Search has been completely revised: better, search-as-you-type results, distance display and the possibility to add waypoints from the search results
- Improved map style
- Many reported bugs fixed (e.g. export of ZIP files with special characters, dashboard problems and more)

- Optimized manual map rotation behavior
- Added setting to disable manual map rotation altogether
- Minor bug fixes
- fixed a crash on some devices during startup

- Plan your tour even better: The dashboard now displays estimated walking and cycling times for selected routes in real time
- Tour organizer: For all your tours, walking and cycling times are given. With a tap on the times you can switch between: walking, cycling or the recorded time
- Map improvements and bug fixes
- various bug fixes (sharing tours, missing elements on map)

- various bug fixes
- adaptation for new iPhone devices

- We have added house numbers (this requires updating the map data on the device)
- various bug fixes
